com.artemis

Class EntitySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.EntitySystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityObserver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DelayedEntityProcessingSystem, EntityProcessingSystem, IntervalEntitySystem, VoidEntitySystem

    public abstract class EntitySystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntityObserver
    The most raw entity system.

    It should not typically be used, but you can create your own entity system handling by extending this. It is recommended that you use the other provided entity system implementations.

    Author:
    Arni Arent

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected World world
      The world this system belongs to.

    • Constructor Summary

      EntitySystem(Aspect aspect)
      Creates an entity system that uses the specified aspect as a matcher against entities.

      • processEntities

        protected abstract void processEntities(ImmutableBag<Entity> entities)
        Any implementing entity system must implement this method and the logic to process the given entities of the system.
        Parameters:
        entities - the entities this system contains.

      • checkProcessing

        protected abstract boolean checkProcessing()
        Check if the system should be processed.
        Returns:
        true if the system should be processed, false if not.

      • initialize

        protected void initialize()
        Override to implement code that gets executed when systems are initialized.

      • inserted

        protected void inserted(Entity e)
        Called if the system has received a entity it is interested in, e.g created or a component was added to it.
        Parameters:
        e - the entity that was added to this system

      • removed

        protected void removed(Entity e)
        Called if a entity was removed from this system, e.g deleted or had one of it's components removed.
        Parameters:
        e - the entity that was removed from this system

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns true if the system is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if enabled, otherwise false

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enabled systems are run during process().

        Systems are enabled by default.

        Parameters:
        enabled - system will not run when set to false

      • check

        protected final void check(Entity e)
        Will check if the entity is of interest to this system.
        Parameters:
        e - entity to check

      • added

        public final void added(Entity e)
        Call when an entity interesting to the system is added to the world.

        Checks if the system is interested in the added entity, if so, will insert it in to the system.

        Specified by:
        added in interface EntityObserver
        Parameters:
        e - the added entity

      • changed

        public final void changed(Entity e)
        Call when an entity interesting to the system has changed in the world.

        Checks if the system is still interested after the entity has changed, e.g a component was removed.

        Specified by:
        changed in interface EntityObserver
        Parameters:
        e - the changed entity

      • deleted

        public final void deleted(Entity e)
        Call when an entity interesting to the system was deleted from the world.

        If the deleted entity is in this system, it will be removed.

        Specified by:
        deleted in interface EntityObserver
        Parameters:
        e - the deleted entity

      • disabled

        public final void disabled(Entity e)
        Call when an entity interesting to the system was disabled.

        If the disabled entity is in this system it will be removed

        Specified by:
        disabled in interface EntityObserver
        Parameters:
        e - the disabled entity

      • enabled

        public final void enabled(Entity e)
        Call when an entity interesting to the system was (re)enabled.

        If the enabled entity is of interest, in will be (re)inserted.

        Specified by:
        enabled in interface EntityObserver
        Parameters:
        e - the (re)enabled entity

      • setWorld

        protected final void setWorld(World world)
        Set the world this manager works on.
        Parameters:
        world - the world to set

      • isPassive

        public boolean isPassive()
        Check if this system is passive.

        A passive system will not process when World.process() is called.

        Returns:
        true if the system is passive

      • setPassive

        protected void setPassive(boolean passive)
        Set if the system is passive or not.

        A passive system will not process when World.process() is called.

        Parameters:
        passive - true if passive, false if not

      • getActives

        public ImmutableBag<Entity> getActives()
        Get all entities being processed by this system.
        Returns:
        a bag containing all active entities of the system
